snippet.title: Off Road Wii Trailer
snippet.description:
Take racing to extreme off road terrain with Land Rover and Ford. 

Race powerful 4x4's, trucks and concept vehicles across desert, water and ice in your bid to be first past the finish line. With 12 distinct race types, real-time damage repair and sweeping tracks designed for aggressive, rough-tough racing, Off Road is an adrenalin-pumping, high-speed racing experience.
